thread.title: Miscreants set house on fire; 4 injured
thread.title_full: Miscreants set house on fire; 4 injured

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Miscreants set house on fire; 4 injured
text:
Tribune News Service
Ballabhgarh, October 20
Four members of a Dalit family received grievous burn injuries after their house was allegedly set on fire by some miscreants in Sunped village of the district in wee hours today.
All the four victims, including two adults and two children, have been shifted to Safdurjung Hospital in New Delhi, where their condition is reported to be serious.
The cause of the incident is reported to be an old enmity between two groups or families in the village. Police force has been deployed in the village. The police are yet to confirm any death, though unconfirmed reports say two of the victims have succumbed to their injuries in the hospital.
